ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the specimen or accession number assigned.

ReferenceDocuments.name: LBREFID
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable. May be used to create RELREC to link this record with a record in another domain.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This can be used to confirm that the appropriate data record is present in the electronic transfer. May be included for linking back to specimens (e.g., Specimen ID).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Template Text
CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2230047 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
